description:
We'll show you how to manage orders and set up payment & shipping in Magento.

This course follows on from the free Magento Introduction (free), Getting Started with Magento & Inventory Management courses.

You're going to learn loads!

There is over 14 Plain English video tutorials included and we show you using examples as we go, step by step.

You're going to learn ALL of this & more:

  • The order workflow in Magento
  • How your customers create orders on your Magento website
  • How you manage customer orders
  • The payment options in Magento & how to setup PayPal website payments
  • What SSL certificates are, why you need one and the easy way of setting them up
  • How to set up the standard shipping options in Magento
  • You'll learn what Magento Connect is
  • How to install your first extension
  • And how to use a free extension to give you comprehensive shipping options in Magento

See we said you're going to learn loads :)

We believe that Magento doesn't need to be nerdy or for the tech-geeks only.

Magento is dead easy to setup and use day to day. We'll show you how, all in Plain English.

With 100% video content, you can follow us along in your own Magento system.

If you've read this far, hit the "Take this Course" button and get started right now,

We'll see you on the inside,

Matt & Dave
title: Order Management in Magento PLUS Payment & Shipping Setup
